actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Foreign Affairs, Ways and Means, Oversight and Reform, Energy and Commerce, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To enact certain legislation relating to supporting law enforcement, protecting the United States, and for other purposes.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats
